      • addUser

        public void addUser​(java.lang.String typeId,
                    java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String lastname,
                    java.lang.String phone,
                    java.lang.String adress)
             throws UserAlreadyExistException,
                    java.lang.Exception
        Name: addUser.
        This method adds a new user, if the user already exist or there are missing mandatory data then return an exception.
        pre: ArrayList usuarios must be initialized.
        pos: the user has been created and added or it throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        typeId - the type of the ID.
        id - the number of the ID.
        firstNames - the first names of the user.
        lastNames - the last names of the user.
        adress - the address of the user (it can be blanked).
        telephone - the telephone of the user (it can be blanked).
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyExistException
        Exception
        UserAlreadyExistException
        java.lang.Exception

                                   java.lang.String typeId)
                            throws UserNotFoundException,
                                   UserAlreadyHasTurnException
        Name: assignTurn.
        This method assign a turn to a user by his typeID and ID, if the user don exist or already has a turn throw an exception.
        pre: ArrayList usuarios must be initialized.
        pos: the user has been assigned with a turn and returned a message or throw an exception.
        Parameters:
        typeId - the type of the ID.
        id - the number of the ID.
        Returns:
        msg String indicating if the turn was correctly assigned
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException
        UserAlreadyHasTurnException
